---
title: std dirs drop
categories: |
  default
version: 0.91.0
default: |
  Drop the current directory from the list, if it's not the only one.
  PWD becomes the next working directory
usage: |
  Drop the current directory from the list, if it's not the only one.
  PWD becomes the next working directory
feature: default
---
